metadata.title: CVE-2022-4139 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An incorrect TLB flush issue was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s GPU i915kernel driver, potentially leading to random memory corruption or dataleaks. This flaw could allow a local user to crash the system or escalatetheir privileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
